response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe is worth every penny of its $12,000 value to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an early-bird special price of $10,800. This represents a significant saving of $1,200 compared to the standard retail price. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to enhance your experience with our top-tier solution. If you're interested, please let me know promptly so we can finalize the details.", "product_price": 10800}
